mapper.sql: e_id, e_la_id, e_la_cpt_id, e_la_user_id, e_lend_time, e_sreturn_time, e_areturn_time, e_is_returned, e_days, e_expense, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3
mapper.insert: insert into gd_expense (e_id, e_la_id, e_la_cpt_id, e_la_user_id, e_lend_time, e_sreturn_time, e_areturn_time, e_is_returned, e_days, e_expense, attribute1, attribute2, attribute3) values (#{eId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eLaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eLaCptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eLaUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eLendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eSreturnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eAreturnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{eIsReturned,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{eDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eExpense,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into gd_expense
e_id,
e_la_id,
e_la_cpt_id,
e_la_user_id,
e_lend_time,
e_sreturn_time,
e_areturn_time,
e_is_returned,
e_days,
e_expense,
attribute1,
attribute2,
attribute3,

mapper.update:
update gd_expense
e_la_id = #{eLaId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
e_la_cpt_id = #{eLaCptId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
e_la_user_id = #{eLaUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
e_lend_time = #{eLendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
e_sreturn_time = #{eSreturnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
e_areturn_time = #{eAreturnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
e_is_returned = #{eIsReturned,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
e_days = #{eDays,jdbcType=INTEGER},
e_expense = #{eExpense,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
attribute1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
attribute3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where e_id = #{eId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update gd_expense set e_la_id = #{eLaId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, e_la_cpt_id = #{eLaCptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, e_la_user_id = #{eLaUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, e_lend_time = #{eLendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, e_sreturn_time = #{eSreturnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, e_areturn_time = #{eAreturnTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, e_is_returned = #{eIsReturned,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, e_days = #{eDays,jdbcType=INTEGER}, e_expense = #{eExpense,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, attribute1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, attribute3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where e_id = #{eId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT TIMESTAMPDIFF( DAY, date_format(e_lend_time, '%Y-%c-%d'), date_format(e_areturn_time, '%Y-%c-%d') ) FROM gd_expense where 1 = 1 AND e_id = #{eId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT count(e.e_id) FROM gd_users u, gd_expense e, gd_lending_apply la WHERE u.user_id = la.la_user_id AND e.e_la_id = la.la_id AND EXISTS ( SELECT 'X' FROM gd_expense e1 WHERE e1.e_id = e.e_id AND e1.attribute1 = 'N' ) AND u.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT a.la_id, u.user_name user_name, c.cpt_name cpt_name, e.e_is_returned is_returned, e.e_days days, e.e_expense expense, e.e_lend_time lend_time, e.e_areturn_time areturn_time, e.attribute1 isPay FROM gd_lending_apply a, gd_computers c, gd_expense e, gd_users u WHERE a.la_cpt_id = c.cpt_id AND a.la_id = e.e_la_id AND a.attribute1 = 'Y' AND a.la_is_check = 'Y' AND a.la_user_id = u.user_id LIMIT #{start},#{offset}

SELECT COUNT(e.e_la_id) FROM gd_lending_apply a, gd_computers c, gd_expense e, gd_users u WHERE a.la_cpt_id = c.cpt_id AND a.la_id = e.e_la_id AND a.attribute1 = 'Y' AND a.la_is_check = 'Y' AND a.la_user_id = u.user_id
